JVN-AMMOFEEDPROBLEM.name: Missile Ammo Feed Problem
JVN-AMMOFEEDPROBLEM.description: By accommodating other kinds of weapon systems in the other half of the mech, the missile ammunition feeding mechanism was re-routed to work in a smaller part of the chassis torso and became less efficient.

JVN-NOCOOLINGJACKET.name: No Cooling Jacket
JVN-NOCOOLINGJACKET.description: No space on this tiny Javelin left torso to fit Cooling Jackets for the Shadow Hawk Cannon. In fact, everything is so cramped, overheating is easy due to bad heat circulation.

JVN-UNBALANCED.name: Unbalanced
JVN-UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech is inherently imbalanced and suffers a penalty to mobility

CDA-AMMOFEEDPROBLEM.name: Missile Ammo Feed Problem
CDA-AMMOFEEDPROBLEM.description: Due to lack of space, the missile ammunition feeding mechanism was re-routed and became less efficient and prone to jam.

LCT-UNBALANCED.name: Cramped Cockpit and Unbalanced
LCT-UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech has an uncomfortably small cockpit. Also, that giant cannon makes this Locust super imbalanced and that affects the maximum speed it can go. The extra gyros on the cannon do nothing to help the myomer bundles' additional load stress.

LOCUST-GUN.name: Locust
LOCUST-GUN.description: The Locust is a surprisingly efficient mech. And even this frankenmech variant has its good points.

WEAK-LEGS-GUN.name: Weak Legs
WEAK-LEGS-GUN.description: This 'Mech has legs that buckle under pressure

NIMBLEJUMPER.name: Nimble Jumper
NIMBLEJUMPER.description: This 'Mech is designed to be more effective with Jump Jets

HARD-PILOT.name: Hard to Pilot
HARD-PILOT.description: This 'Mech is designed to be used by expert pilots and gets a penalty to Piloting Skill

IMP-LIFE-SUPPORT.name: Improved Life Support
IMP-LIFE-SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has enhanced defenses for the pilot

INFERNALFIRE.name: Infernal Fire
INFERNALFIRE.description: Somehow, this cursed 'Mechs is capable of removing the heat from its energy weapons to make the flamers hotter and with extended range.

MOUNT-RT.name: Directional Torso Mount (RT)
MOUNT-RT.description: Shortened reload time for torso-mounted weapons

NARROW-PROFILE.name: Narrow Profile
NARROW-PROFILE.description: The unit is constructed to present a very narrow or low profile to any incoming fire, with a chance to complete negate damage.

CURSED.name: Cursed 'Mech
CURSED.description: The Dark One exerts a toll on the mind of its pilot. Or maybe it's just that strange low frequency from the fusion reactor that messes with their sense. Pilots who do not know how to win or when to flee will have their body and soul consumed if they lose a battle.

MAD-DRK1.name: Black Marauder Weird Structure
MAD-DRK1.description: The Black Marauder has a higher density structure with an almost organic shape looks. Some of those internal spaces are so large you can fit a body inside. Also, an evil aura emanates from its fearsome appearance affecting enemy competence.

CPLT-UNBALANCED.name: Unbalanced
CPLT-UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech is inherently imbalanced and suffers a penalty to mobility

HBK4G-BNC.name: Ballistic Ammo Feed Problem
HBK4G-BNC.description: To accommodate that gigantic arm, something had to be lost, so ammunition feeding mechanism was re-routed and became less efficient.

HBK4J-BNC.name: Missile Ammo Feed Problem
HBK4J-BNC.description: To accommodate that gigantic arm, something had to be lost, so ammunition feeding mechanism was re-routed and became less efficient.

VERY-UNBALANCED.name: Very Unbalanced
VERY-UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech is very imbalanced and suffers a penalty to mobility. It barely can punch without falling.

BATTLEFISTS.name: Battlefists
BATTLEFISTS.description: The Hand actuators of a 'Mech with Battlefists have been specially modified for close combat

DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN-FM.name: Difficult To Maintain
DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN-FM.description: This 'Mech is built with little regard to maintenance

WEAK-HEAD.name: Weak Head Armor
WEAK-HEAD.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

MELEE.name: Melee Specialization
MELEE.description: This 'Mech is designed or upgraded for melee combat

UAV-CARRIER.name: UAV Carrier
UAV-CARRIER.description: This 'Mech has a built-in compartment for standard UAV drone(s).

BARREL-FIST (L).name: Barrel Fist Left Arm
BARREL-FIST (L).description: This BattleMech has been designed to be able to use an arm in melee combat despite the lack of a hand actuator.

UM-CURSE.name: UrbanMech curse
UM-CURSE.description: Something affects the maximum speed performance this 'Mech can reach. Might be related to the entire center torso being replaced by an UrbanMech.

NOJUMPY.name: No Jumping
NOJUMPY.description: This 'Mech cannot use jumpjets for many reasons, so they are offline even if installed. So don't try and break the mech doing a death from above to itself because its gyro cannot process the recoil of its weapons on mid-air, too unbalaced, etc.
